tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I came to Dr. Anuradha Tamaria because of checks during my pregnancy. As a foreigner on holiday in Delhi. Dr. Tamaria explained to me with all patience and understanding how she works. I had the 20-week and 30-week check with her. She explained to me very clearly what certain medical terms mean and which vitamins and minerals I definitely had to use. My experience with this doctor and her team are excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Anuradha Tamaria, she is amazing. Simply WOW. Her diagnosis and understanding is excellent. You can ask any questions and discuss any problems about your related health, she will explain very politely. Staff also good. Go there without any hesitation. Thank you doctor.
Regards, Rupashree Panda

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Overall it was good, however even though we booked appointment in advance, it was raining, ran from our offices early in Gurgaon to reach on time. We still had to wait for approximately hour from our scheduled time to meet doctor and were kept waiting for almost 55 minutes. We were send at the last after all the patients were addressed. Doctor greeted well though.
#notExpected - could have taken our time to take leave from office for this.
reply_text: \"Sorry for delay and inconvenience caused. I personally thank you for your patience and appreciate your time. I am glad you found us good. We'll try harder to ensure consultation without such delay in future.\

review: She was very friendly and most importantly she was willing to listen patiently. A great experience overall, will recommend everyone!
